'Faster' is a 2003 documentary film about the motorcycle road racing world
championship, MotoGP. Filmed between 2001 and 2002 by director Mark
Neale, it features cinematography by music video director Grant Gee and is
narrated by Ewan McGregor. It was succeeded by a 2-disc "Ultimate Collector's
Edition" re-release in 2004 which included "Faster '03-'04 The Sequel". In 2006,
[[The Doctor, The Tornado and The Kentucky Kid (Film)|The Doctor, The Tornado
and The Kentucky Kid]] (or DTK) was released, followed by "Fastest" in 2011.
